questiontext.text:
Submit four grouping patterns created in the Pulse Grouping Lab. Each pattern must be at least 16 pulses.

Pattern Requirements:

  1. Pattern 1: Only 2-pulse groupings
  2. Pattern 2: Only 3-pulse groupings
  3. Pattern 3: Mixture of 2s and 3s
  4. Pattern 4: Hemiola interaction (one track in 2s, one in 3s)

For each pattern, include both:

  • 1 TXT file exported from the lab
  • A brief (2â€“3 sentence) explanation of your choices and what you heard

You must upload 4 TXT files + enter 4 explanations.

graderinfo.text:
Grading (Pass/Revise):

  • All four patterns meet the structural requirements
  • TXT files show correct 2/3 grouping logic
  • Explanations are present and reflect basic listening

No detailed analysis required. Award full marks if the submission is complete and coherent.
